column4: Hi , I have a bluray cd here. It doesnt show up in my computer, How can I play it. The cd player shows up with normal cds
Your computer/laptop is capable of reading BluRay discs?  You have BluRay Device?
If it does not work, then it might will not work.  As technology continues to advance, the people are making dramatic changes to the players, the hardwares, the cables, the monitors, etc.
How can I test if it has bluray compatabiltf
I dont think it suports it
The problem is the security measure taking places. They're making it harder and harder.
The best way is to test it yourself.
Well, It didn't work last night . Wasn't sure why.
See what jrib said. You will have to use "DISPLAY=:0 limewire" as to indict which display/monitor to use
You always can test it by "ssh localhost" then run the program. :o
That crashes , just after it starts up
Read the error message. Were you able to launch limewire just fine in the terminal?
I just ran it again. But no errors ? strange
